errors.error_description: System dependencies are installed after running the bot, which is incorrect order - they should be installed before setting up the virtual environment
correction_candidates: Move step 4 to be step 1, before installing library requirements
Install system dependencies before step 1 by adding them as step 0
Combine system dependencies with library requirements in step 1
Remove system dependencies installation from quick install section entirely
errors.golden_answer: Move step 4 to be step 1, before installing library requirements
